org.apache.lenya.cms.repo
Interface Site

All Known Implementing Classes:
SiteProxy
public interface Site

The site structure of an area.

Method Detail

getChildren

public SiteNode[] getChildren()
                       throws RepositoryException
Returns:
The top level nodes in this area.
Throws:
RepositoryException - if an error occurs.

preOrder

public SiteNode[] preOrder()
                    throws RepositoryException
Returns:
The nodes of this site in preorder.
Throws:
RepositoryException - if an error occurs.

addChild

public SiteNode addChild(java.lang.String name,
                         Asset contentNode)
                  throws RepositoryException
Parameters:
name - The name.
contentNode - The content node which the site node refers to.
Returns:
a site node.
Throws:
RepositoryException - if a node with this path already exists.

                  throws RepositoryException
Parameters:

Returns:
a site node.
Throws:
RepositoryException - if the node does not exist.

getNode

public SiteNode getNode(java.lang.String path)
                 throws RepositoryException
Parameters:
path - The absolute path of the node, starting with a slash.
Returns:
A site node.
Throws:
RepositoryException - if the node does not exist.

getArea

public Area getArea()
             throws RepositoryException
Returns:
The area this site belongs to.
Throws:
RepositoryException - if an error occurs.

move

public void move(java.lang.String srcAbsPath,
                 java.lang.String destAbsPath)
          throws RepositoryException
Moves a subtree to another location.

Parameters:
srcAbsPath - The path of the node to move.
destAbsPath - The destination path.
Throws:
RepositoryException - if the destination node already exists or the destination parent does not exist.

getReferences

public SiteNode[] getReferences(Asset asset)
                         throws RepositoryException
Parameters:
asset - An asset.
Returns:
The nodes referencing the asset.
Throws:
RepositoryException - if an error occurs.

getFirstReference

public SiteNode getFirstReference(Asset asset)
                           throws RepositoryException
Parameters:
asset - An asset.
Returns:
The first node referencing the document or null if the asset is not referenced.
Throws:
RepositoryException - if an error occurs.

hasChild

public boolean hasChild(java.lang.String name)
                 throws RepositoryException
Checks if the site has a certain child.

Parameters:
name - The child name.
Returns:
A boolean value.
Throws:
RepositoryException - if an error occurs.
